Giuliani seeks bankruptcy after $148 million judgment in defamation caseRudy Giuliani filed for bankruptcy on Thursday, just days after he was ordered to pay $148 million to two former Georgia election workers he falsely accused of fraud as he worked to overturn Donald Trump's 2020 presidential election loss. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 17:44:20 GMT V7OCJOZNABIEBFHP3XMV5KZYGI https://www.reuters.com/legal/giuliani-seeks-bankruptcy-after-148-mln-judgment-defamation-case-filing-2023-12-21/Luc Cohen合法的
Russia sentences ex-government minister to 12 years in prison for embezzlementA Russian court on Thursday sentenced former minister Mikhail Abyzov to 12 years in jail, finding him guilty of fraud and organising a criminal group, state-run news agencies reported. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 17:28:02 GMT 7EGJ3HBN6FMEHG4DASXDVVVCSA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-sentences-ex-government-minister-12-years-prison-embezzlement-2023-12-21/Reuters世界欧洲
Bosnia's top court head, ex-spy chief detained in wiretapping affairThe head of Bosnia's state court and the former head of the spy agency are to be remanded in custody for one month over alleged wiretapping of the court's judges and investigators, a judge ruled on Thursday. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 17:02:46 GMT NYEV23A3ERMCLPD7EL6Q4VNI4E https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/bosnias-top-court-head-ex-spy-chief-detained-wiretapping-affair-2023-12-21/Reuters世界欧洲
UAE foreign minister meets with Palestinian official in Abu DhabiThe United Arab Emirates (UAE) foreign minister has met a senior Palestinian Authority (PA) official in Abu Dhabi where they discussed international efforts to achieve a ceasefire in Gaza, the Emirati state news agency reported on Thursday. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 16:56:56 GMT MQ35RSHECVJUJKFZF5GVJNP3EM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/uae-foreign-minister-meets-with-palestinian-official-abu-dhabi-2023-12-21/Reuters世界中东
Ahead of UN vote, US says bid to boost Gaza aid could slow deliveriesAhead of a likely vote on Thursday, the United States said there are "serious and widespread concerns" that the current draft of a U.N. Security Council proposal that aims to boost humanitarian aid to the Gaza Strip could actually slow down deliveries. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 16:51:07 GMT 6EV4V6YUXNO3TFCF3RW6TUSTIA https://www.reuters.com/world/ahead-un-vote-us-says-bid-boost-gaza-aid-could-slow-deliveries-2023-12-21/Michelle Nichols世界
Entire Gaza population facing hunger crisis, famine risk -U.N.-backed reportThe entire 2.3 million population of Gaza is facing crisis levels of hunger and the risk of famine is increasing each day, a U.N.-backed body said in a report published on Thursday. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 16:35:13 GMT OP5Z4US3DVI2BFNQ4GUWFTSU7M https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/entire-gaza-population-faceing-hunger-crisis-famine-risk-un-backed-report-2023-12-21/Reuters世界中东
Twenty-four Venezuelans released as part of U.S. prisoner swap, opposition saysTwenty-four Venezuelans have been freed as part of this week's prisoner exchange deal with the United States, Venezuelan opposition presidential candidate Maria Corina Machado said on Thursday. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 16:20:04 GMT VIZKIOMJK5MAHPK7PRDIPBGJT4 https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/twenty-four-venezuelans-released-part-us-prisoner-swap-opposition-says-2023-12-21/Reuters世界美洲
Ukrainian lawmakers back legalisation of medical cannabisUkrainian lawmakers voted to legalise the medical use of cannabis on Thursday after activists and supporters called for the step in order to treat millions of people including soldiers wounded in the war with Russia. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 15:53:28 GMT MXDVNMB6JZKFFIKXZ5EU4SUNA4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukrainian-lawmakers-back-legalization-medical-cannabis-2023-12-21/Reuters世界欧洲
Gunman kills at least 15 people in Prague university shootingA gunman killed at least 15 people and wounded at least 24 others at a Prague university on Thursday before he was "eliminated", according to police and Prague emergency services, marking the country's worst-ever mass shooting. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 15:23:37 GMT OSUGMMLBDNJRHAGLOJDY4O3HJU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/prague-university-shooting-leaves-several-dead-police-say-2023-12-21/Jan Lopatka, Jason Hovet世界欧洲
Audit of Spanish Church abuses finds more than 2,000 victimsAn investigation commissioned by the Spanish Catholic Church into child sexual abuse by members of the clergy and non-clerical staff has so far identified 1,383 complaints and 2,056 victims, an audit of the inquiry showed on Thursday. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 15:22:00 GMT 4HGALYY6AFMJFMID6IUZUFBBPM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/audit-spanish-church-abuses-finds-more-than-2000-victims-2023-12-21/Reuters世界欧洲
Independence referendum is out of the question, Spain's PM tells CataloniaSpain's Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez on Thursday told the Catalan regional president a self-determination referendum is out of the question even after he allied with Catalan separatist parties in Parliament.
